channel.title: PODVAL
channel.description: Collection of DJ live sessions from PODVAL and PODVAL COZY.
channel.itunes:subtitle: PODVAL - is a home for music collected gently by human ears.
channel.itunes:author: PODVAL sessions
channel.itunes:summary: Collection of DJ live sessions from PODVAL and PODVAL COZY.

item.title: PODVAL.001 - Anatoly.möd
item.dc:creator: PODVAL Sessions
item.itunes:author: PODVAL
item.description: Great collection of electro, house and techno tracks, gently and carefully assembled by Anatoly from möd collective.
item.itunes:summary: Great collection of electro, house and techno tracks, gently and carefully assembled by Anatoly from möd collective.

item.title: PODVAL.002 - Alexander.möd
item.itunes:author: PODVAL
item.description: Aleksander from möd is debuting and crushing PODVAL sessions. Shake your legs, move your body and listen carefully to this killing mix full of techno tracks.
item.itunes:summary: Aleksander from möd is debuting and crushing PODVAL sessions. Shake your legs, move your body and listen carefully to this killing mix full of techno tracks.

item.title: PODVAL.COZY.003 - Editorial Part I
item.itunes:author: PODVAL
item.itunes:subtitle: COZY.003
item.description: Smooth, groovy and full of warm melodies mix by its permanent editor Arty9000.
item.itunes:summary: Smooth, groovy and full of warm melodies mix by its permanent editor Arty9000.

item.title: PODVAL.COZY.003 - Editorial Part II
item.itunes:author: PODVAL
item.itunes:subtitle: COZY.003
item.description: tranquil, groovy and ambient mix by its permanent editor Tolya.
item.itunes:summary: tranquil, groovy and ambient mix by its permanent editor Tolya.

item.title: PODVAL.004 - Marmi
item.itunes:author: PODVAL
item.description: Introducing Marmi - great father, electronic music teacher, producer and musician. He crushed our Podval Sessions with his beast house mix.
item.itunes:summary: Introducing Marmi - great father, electronic music teacher, producer and musician. He crushed our Podval Sessions with his beast house mix.

item.title: PODVAL.005 - Senary
item.itunes:author: PODVAL
item.description: Listen and dance with us to the incredibly huge, frenchy and groovy beats gently collected by misterious Senary.
item.itunes:summary: Listen and dance with us to the incredibly huge, frenchy and groovy beats gently collected by misterious Senary.

item.title: PODVAL.COZY.006 - Tendresse Rage
item.itunes:author: PODVAL
item.itunes:subtitle: COZY.006
item.description: Get jizzy with us under the electro beat driven vibes w/ beautiful and mesmerizing Tendresse Rage.
item.itunes:summary: Get jizzy with us under the electro beat driven vibes w/ beautiful and mesmerizing Tendresse Rage.

item.title: PODVAL.007 - Yanlis
item.itunes:author: PODVAL
item.description: Get your ass shaked with the hottest mix of electro / dnb / dubstep aggresively played by Yanlis on Podval Sessions.
item.itunes:summary: Get your ass shaked with the hottest mix of electro / dnb / dubstep aggresively played by Yanlis on Podval Sessions.

item.title: PODVAL.COZY.008 - FB
item.itunes:author: PODVAL
item.itunes:subtitle: COZY.008
item.description: Dance with us under the truly uk garage driven mix by FB (Fucking Boyfriend).
item.itunes:summary: Dance with us under the truly uk garage driven mix by FB (Fucking Boyfriend).

item.title: PODVAL.COZY.009 - Kosmonavt
item.itunes:author: PODVAL
item.itunes:subtitle: COZY.009
item.description: Get ready to shake your booties for this thrilling and groovy playlist arranged by Kosmonavt. Make some noise!
item.itunes:summary: Get ready to shake your booties for this thrilling and groovy playlist arranged by Kosmonavt. Make some noise!
